**********
json_speller
**********

json_speller is a spelling corrector based on levenshtine distance,
distilbert maskedLM. It decreases memory, time consumption.

.. _json_speller: https://github.com/jasonheesanglee/json_speller


Installation
============

Visit the :doc:`json_speller installation instructions <users/installing>`.

Usage examples
==============

Check out :doc:`examples <examples/index>` to learn how to use json_speller.

Documentation
=============

Check out the :doc:`documentation <api/index>`.
